free_text.Prerequisite for: Advanced topics in financial econometrics[br/]Credit risk[br/]Derivatives[br/]Financial econometrics[br/]Fixed income analysis[br/]Investments
free_text.Required prior knowledge: Basic notions of statistics and economics
free_text.Content: - Linear models;[br/]- Least squares regression;[br/]- Instrumental variables;[br/]- Nonlinear models;[br/]- Nonspherical errors;[br/]- Generalized method of moments;[br/]- Panel data models, fixed effects and random effects;[br/]- Consistency, efficiency and asymptotic distribution of estimators;[br/]- Hypothesis testing
free_text.Learning outcomes: To present basic econometric models and methods to obtain inference results
